message:
"1) Create a browser plugin/bookmarklet to allow a real-time social commenting layer to appear on any site
2) Clean it up a bit, open source it, and allow others to create their own 'Fluins' on their own domains which can link back to the original fluin.com
3) Clean it up and perform a massive makeover... create a new web community right here

Thoughts? Comments? Ideas?"
Sounds awesome! I'll check into it when I get home.
